Just like anyone else, I bought the PVE DLC, 3 hours later, I still haven't been able to play it. What a waste of money and time, to think I was gonna take tomorrow off work to play it and stream it all day long but now I rather go suffer a day at work than deal with this bs. GGs Blizzard, I didn't think you could disappoint me anymore than you already have and yet you managed to find a way.

game is ok but the company running it are complete s**ters.

there are dozens of full length yt documentaries going over in depth all the problems with OW2.
until the company addresses those problems the game deserves a negative review unfortunately. 

That being said game is very well made and has potential but is completely held back and ruined by greedy delusional corporate s**ters.

You are right, but Genshin Impact is a new open world adventure game independently developed by Miyou. The game takes place in a fantasy world called 'Tivat', where the chosen person is granted the 'Eye of God' to guide the power of the elements. You will play a mysterious role called "Traveler", who will meet friends with different personalities and unique abilities in the free travel, defeat strong enemies with them, and find lost relatives - at the same time, gradually discover the truth of "Genshin Impact".
Downloaded it on Steam just to say spend your money elsewhere. Better with friends? Sure. Greedy and predatory FOMO tactics? Also yes.
